shop_introduction: In this section you can configure your shop, will only take a couple of minutes to open your business to the world. We will guide you step by step in the process.
product-description: After categories is done, it is time to create your products. You can link each product to his category
configuration-description: Important to fill description, email and phone so your new customers can reach to you. You can tweak this values in the configuration page..
